attributes.action: Make cat owners responsible for their pets actions including fowling in peoples gardens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every cat owner should be made to pay for any damage caused by their cat to peoples property including any fowling with heavy fines imposed. Cats should be classed the same prolem as dogs in fowling etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
